messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J1(4.2)}Hey, you don't look too good.{~N}Are you OK?
{~J1(4.3)}Lisa...{~N}Do you know a woman{~N}named Dahlia Gillespie?
{~J1(4.0)}She never sees anybody,{~N}so I don't know{~N}that much about her.
{~J1(5.2)}I heard her kid died in a fire,{~N}and supposedly she's been crazy{~N}ever since.{~E}
{~J1(5.1)}Well, she says the town is being{~N}devoured by the darkness.
{~J1(2.7)}Do you have any idea{~N}what she's talking about?
{~J1(2.9)}Before this place was turned{~N}into a resort,
{~J1(3.4)}the townspeople here were{~N}on the quiet side.
{~J1(4.8)}Weird occult stuff...{~N}Black magic, that kind of thing.
{~J1(5.0)}As young people moved away,{~N}the people figured they'd been{~N}summoned by the gods.
{~J1(3.7)}Evidently, things like that{~N}used to happen around here{~N}all the time.
{~J1(3.5)}Before the resort,{~N}there really wasn't{~N}anything else out here.
{~J1(4.5)}Everyone was so flipped out.{~N}Gotta blame it on something.
{~J1(3.8)}Then a lot of new people{~N}came in and everybody{~N}clammed up about it.
{~J0(4.8)}Last time I heard anything{~N}about it was, gosh, years ago...
{~J1(4.4)}When several people connected{~N}with developing the town{~N}died in accidents.
{~J0(4.6)}Thank God you came back.{~N}I was scared to be here all alone.
{~J1(3.3)}Lisa, can you tell me{~N}how to get to the lake?
{~J1(3.3)}There's a water works over by{~N}my old elementary school.
{~J1(4.2)}There's an underground tunnel{~N}out there used for inspections,{~N}or something!
{~J1(3.2)}I remember hearing it runs{~N}all the way to the lake!{~E}
{~J1(2.3)}You think I can get to the lake{~N}from there?
{~J1(3.1)}I've never been down{~N}in there myself,{~N}so I'm not positive.
{~J1(2.8)}Besides, it's all fenced off{~N}to keep people out.
{~J1(2.3)}If there's a chance,{~N}I've got to try.{~E}
{~J1(4.2)}I don't want to be alone.{~N}It's so scary. I can't stand it.
{~J1(2.6)}This may not be the safest place{~N}in the world either.
{~J1(3.6)}I can't promise you anything,{~N}but I'll do my best{~N}to protect you.
{~J1(4.2)}No...{~N}somehow I feel I'm not supposed{~N}to leave this place.
{~J1(3.0)}I'll be back as soon as{~N}I find my daughter.{~E}
